TEXT.TITLE: TRINOVA CORP <TNV> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 52 cts vs 43 cts Net 17.7 mln vs 14.2 mln Sales 413.1 mln vs 361.6 mln Avg shrs 34.3 mln vs 30.3 mln Nine mths Oper shr 1.58 dlrs vs 66 cts Oper net 53.9 mln vs 26.7 mln Sales 1.22 billion vs 1.08 billion Avg shrs 33.5 mln vs 35.2 mln NOTE: 1986 nine mths net includes 20.6 mln dlr provision for restructuring but excludes 85.0 mln dlr gain on sale of discontinued glass business and 1,330,000 dlr gain from discontinued operations. Quarter orders 350.2 mln dlrs vs 296.7 mln dlrs. Backlog 507.6 mln dlrs vs 444.4 mln dlrs. Reuter
